name: Sabra Health Care REIT, Inc.
description: Sabra Health Care REIT, Inc. is a leading publicly traded real estate investment trust (REIT) that focuses on acquiring and managing healthcare-related properties across the United States and Canada. Founded in 2010, Sabra specializes in the ownership of skilled nursing facilities, senior housing properties, and other healthcare real estate. The company aims to provide high-quality healthcare services by partnering with a diverse group of operators, which allows it to maintain a well-balanced portfolio that is resilient in various market conditions. With a commitment to enhancing the quality of life for residents and patients, Sabra invests in facilities that offer skilled nursing, assisted living, and post-acute care services. The company is dedicated to delivering strong returns to its shareholders through prudent financial management and strategic acquisitions. Sabra's portfolio includes a mix of triple-net leased and managed facilities, ensuring it has a flexible operational framework that adapts to shifts in the healthcare landscape. As a significant player in the healthcare real estate sector, Sabra is well-positioned to capitalize on the growing demand for senior living and healthcare services due to demographic trends and an aging population.

seo.meta_title: Sabra Health Care REIT, Inc. | Leading Healthcare REIT
seo.meta_description: Explore Sabra Health Care REIT, Inc., a leader in healthcare real estate investment. Discover our commitment to quality care and strategic property management.

faq.question: What type of properties does Sabra invest in?
faq.answer: Sabra invests primarily in healthcare-related properties, including skilled nursing facilities, senior housing, and post-acute care facilities.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Sabra Health Care?
faq.answer: Rick Matros is the CEO of Sabra Health Care REIT, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Sabra Health Care headquartered?
faq.answer: Sabra Health Care is headquartered in Irvine, California, USA.

faq.question: When was Sabra Health Care founded?
faq.answer: Sabra Health Care was founded in 2010.
